name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience specializing in **Python**, **CI/CD**, and **microservices** architecture. Expert in building robust, automated solutions using cloud platforms like **Azure** and **AWS**, aligning well with compliance standards and best practices in software engineering. Proficient in creating APIs with **FastAPI**, and adept at leveraging **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **Terraform** for efficient deployment and Infrastructure as Code (IaC) strategies. Experienced in implementing efficient workflows using tools like **Databricks**, **Argo**, and **Airflow** for seamless data integration and processing.

I have a proven track record in developing high-performance applications within the healthcare and financial sectors. My solid foundation in full-stack development encompasses technologies like **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and **Django**, complemented by my experience in intelligent automation and AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics. I am passionate about creating secure, high-quality software solutions and have successfully led projects focused on compliance with standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.

experience.responsibilities:
- Utilized **Python** and **FastAPI** to architect and develop scalable, full-stack healthcare and financial platforms, ensuring compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
- Developed and maintained CI/CD pipelines with **Azure** and **AWS**, incorporating automated testing and deployment strategies to enhance efficiency.
- Leveraged **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for transforming monolithic applications into microservices architectures, achieving over **99.9%** uptime and high availability.
- Implemented cloud infrastructure using **Terraform** for Infrastructure as Code, optimizing resource management and deployment consistency.
- Designed and deployed **API** services for seamless integration with front-end frameworks like React, ensuring smooth user experiences across devices.
- Integrated automated testing frameworks including **Jest**, **Cypress**, and **PyTest** for comprehensive coverage of **unit**, **integration**, and **E2E** testing across applications.
- Developed sophisticated data processing pipelines with **Apache Airflow** to manage workflows and data orchestration efficiently, resulting in improved data processing times by up to **30%**.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver features and enhancements using coding best practices and design patterns, reducing bug counts by **20%** through rigorous testing.
- Employed **Databricks** for scalable data analysis and machine learning integration, enhancing analytics performance for real-time insights in healthcare and financial domains.
- Ensured optimized application performance by implementing robust governance and monitoring strategies through **AWS** and **Azure services**, improving system responsiveness by **25%**.

• Enhanced the scalability and reliability of financial platforms through the implementation of **Microservices** architecture using **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django), achieving improved transaction throughput by **40%**.
• Developed robust, user-centric front-end applications employing **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, and **Next.js**, leveraging **TypeScript** alongside **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to ensure a responsive user experience with a load time reduction of **30%**.
• Engineered real-time transaction monitoring systems and analytics dashboards utilizing **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, facilitating operations teams to observe and respond to financial activities with a response time improvement of **50%**.
• Implemented a reliable event-driven architecture by integrating **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring efficient asynchronous communication for alerts and compliance workflows.
• Designed and managed ETL pipelines through **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, enabling real-time data ingestion that improved processing speeds by **20%**.
• Developed AI/ML solutions for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure Machine Learning**, significantly reducing false positives by **35%** through advanced transaction pattern analysis.
• Created and integrated ML pipelines for credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification with **MLflow** and **Airflow**, embedding predictive insights directly into backend services for improved decision-making efficiency.

• Designed and optimized backend services for a global e-commerce platform using **Python** (FastAPI) and **Node.js** (NestJS), ensuring high availability, low latency, and scalability across key modules such as checkout and order fulfillment, impacting approximately **10,000+** transactions daily.
• Engineered real-time features using **WebSockets** and event-driven architecture powered by **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, enabling responsive order updates and customer support, improving response times by **30%**.
• Developed and maintained CI/CD pipelines for deployment automation with **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, resulting in a **50%** reduction in deployment time and enhanced stability through automated testing practices.
• Leveraged **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and **Cassandra** for distributed data storage, ensuring fast, fault-tolerant data access, reducing query response times to under **50ms**.
• Integrated AI/ML-based recommendation engines using **scikit-learn** and **TensorFlow** to personalize product listings—leading to an increase in conversion rates by **20%** through optimized search relevance based on user behavior.
• Implemented **Terraform** for Infrastructure as Code (IaC), maintaining consistency across **Azure** and **AWS** environments, streamlining deployments across **3 different** cloud infrastructures.
• Created responsive, SEO-friendly e-commerce UIs using **Next.js**, ensuring compliance with accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1) and improving mobile engagement metrics by **40%**.
• Built secure payment workflows integrated with **Stripe** and **PayPal**, applying PCI-compliant tokenized transactions—processing upwards of **7,000** transactions per week.
• Applied role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** for secure access, ensuring GDPR compliance and protecting user data throughout the platform.
